participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending my free time surfing and learning new things about the ocean.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
My ethnicity is not important, but my feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i work on trucks.
I don't have my own car, but I'm working on it!

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Working on trucks, wish I had a car of my own, but it's in the works!
Ah that's tough! I'm a soccer mom, so I can't imagine not having a car. What do you enjoy doing when you're not working on trucks?
I like to surf and learn new things about the ocean. I also enjoy spending time with my family, even though we're not super close.

That sounds awesome! I'm a professional translator and love to collect souvenirs from my travels. I've been enjoying creating my comics and presenting them to publishers, but school is taking up a lot of my time.
That's really cool! What kind of comics do you like to make?
I like to make comics about my life and the things I experience. I also like to make comics about current events and social issues.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to see some of your work if you have any online.
Yeah, I have some of my work on my website. I'll send you a link!
